snippet: The new Fusion sedan is one aspect of Ford’s all-out bid to gain share in the competitive midsize car segment dominated in recent decades by Japanese automakers.
abstract: Ford Motor Co's new Fusion sedan is one aspect of its all-out bid to gain share in the competitive midsize car segment dominated by Japanese automakers; revamped Fusion underscores just how hard Detroit's automakers are pushing to solidify their turnarounds with improved passenger cars; they still have only about one-third of the car market.
lead_paragraph: The new Fusion sedan is one aspect of Ford’s all-out bid to gain share in the competitive midsize car segment dominated in recent decades by Japanese automakers.

headline.seo: Ford Turns to the Midsize Car to Challenge Japan
